snippet: The Neediest Cases Fund helps a young woman find a room of her own.
abstract: Editorial highlights case of Dionne Parsons, homeless woman who has found permanent housing through the Transitional Living Community, part of Brooklyn Community Services, agency supported by the New York Times Neediest cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: The Neediest Cases Fund helps a young woman find a room of her own.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
